betterquesting:10.desc:8:
the §6Holo-Projector§r allows you to §ecast a hologram of the multiblock structures used in §5Advanced Rocketry§r. To use, §eclick the button of which multiblock you want§r and [§7R-Click§r] to cast the hologram. Weirdly, you §ccannot scroll down with your scroll wheel§r. You need to instead §edrag up/down while holding [§7L-Click§e] to scroll through the GUI§r. 
You would also need to use [§7Shift + R-Click§r] while holding the Holo-Projector to §escroll through the hologram's layers§r.

To craft one, you'll need three §6Redstone Dust§r, an §6Iron Plate§r, and two §6Optical Sensor§rs.
